columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the circuit.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The tier of the SKU. Possible values include: 'Standard', 'Premium', 'Basic', 'Local'.

columns.name: sku_family
columns.description: The family of the SKU. Possible values include: 'UnlimitedData', 'MeteredData'.

columns.name: circuit_provisioning_state
columns.description: The CircuitProvisioningState state of the resource.

columns.name: service_provider_provisioning_state
columns.description: The ServiceProviderProvisioningState state of the resource. Possible values include: 'NotProvisioned', 'Provisioning', 'Provisioned', 'Deprovisioning'.

columns.name: express_route_port
columns.description: The reference to the ExpressRoutePort resource when the circuit is provisioned on an ExpressRoutePort resource.

columns.name: bandwidth_in_gbps
columns.description: The bandwidth of the circuit when the circuit is provisioned on an ExpressRoutePort resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the express route circuit resource. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Failed'.
